getting-started.name: Getting Started
getting-started.description: Learn how to create your first bathroom layout in under a minute.

steps.title: Welcome! üëã
steps.content:
This is your design toolkit. Here you'll find room shapes and bathroom fixtures to build your perfect layout.

Let's walk through the basics together!

steps.title: Add Your Room
steps.content: Click on Room to add a room to your canvas. This will be the foundation of your bathroom design.

steps.title: Add Fixtures
steps.content:
Click on Bath to add it to your room.

üí° Pro tip: You can also drag fixtures directly onto the canvas!

steps.title: Lock Your Room
steps.content: Click Lock Room to prevent accidentally moving the room while you place fixtures. The room stays put, but fixtures remain moveable.

steps.title: Resize & Rotate üìê
steps.content:
Once an item is on the canvas, click it to select it. You'll see:

‚Ä¢ Corner handles ‚Äî drag to resize
‚Ä¢ Circle handle (above) ‚Äî drag to rotate

Try it on your room or fixtures!

steps.title: Export Your Design
steps.content: When you're happy with your layout, click Export PDF to download a professional bathroom plan with AM Hancock branding.

steps.title: You're Ready! üéâ
steps.content:
That's it ‚Äî you now know the basics!

Pro tips:
‚Ä¢ Shift+Click to select multiple items
‚Ä¢ Drag selected items to move them together

Happy designing!

feature-tour.name: All Features
feature-tour.description: A quick overview of everything the bathroom planner can do.

steps.title: Room Shapes
steps.content: Choose from Square or L-Shape room layouts. Click to add them, or drag them onto the canvas.

steps.title: Bathroom Fixtures
steps.content: A complete library: Bath, Toilet, Shower, Basin, Radiator, Door, Mirror and more. Drag any item onto the canvas to place it.

steps.title: Resize Items üìè
steps.content: Click any item on the canvas to select it. Drag the corner handles to resize it to your exact dimensions.

steps.title: Rotate Items üîÑ
steps.content: The circular handle above a selected item lets you rotate it. Perfect for fitting fixtures at angles!

steps.title: Lock Room
steps.content: Toggle this to lock the room in place while arranging fixtures. Prevents accidentally moving your room layout.

steps.title: Undo & Redo
steps.content: Made a mistake? Use Undo (‚åòZ) and Redo (‚åò‚áßZ) to step through your changes.

steps.title: Theme Toggle
steps.content: Switch between Light and Dark mode for comfortable designing any time of day.

steps.title: Export to PDF
steps.content: Download your bathroom plan as a professional PDF with AM Hancock branding. Perfect for sharing or printing!

steps.title: Delete Items
steps.content: Select items on the canvas, then click here to remove them. You can also press Delete or Backspace.
